c74object.name: fl.timer~
c74object.digest: Calculates the time elapsed between trigger frame inputs and the subsequent reset frame.
c74object.description: Time is reported in the specified units. Output is a single value.

entry.name: 0. /units [instantiation enum]
entry.description:
Sets the time units used to for output.
[0] - samples [1] - ms [2] - seconds
